name: Invantive Composition Template
summary: Learn about .COMPOSITIONTEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: When you publish the template, the data from your defined database or application will be filled into the template.

description: Template used by Composition, a module that can be added to Microsoft Word to combine Word documents with data from databases and other programs; contains information that defines the layout of the document and the placement of data from the Composition data model file (.COMPOSITIONMODEL).
